item.title: Improve Google Reader readability with userstyles.org and stylish
item.description: As with most Google products Reader is utilitarian. Install the Stylish Google Chrome extension. Restyle the web with Stylish, a user styles manager. Stylish lets you easily install themes and skins for Google, Facebook,â€¦ User styles are themes for web sites. User styles empower your browsing experience by letting you customize web sites. Take out irrelevant content, change colors, or completely redesign the entire site. Stylish lets you easily manage user styles.
